testimonials.title: Customer Reviews and Impressions - About Creadive Agency

services.title: Digital Marketing and Design Services
services.subtitle: We offer the best digital solutions and creative design services for your business

web-development.title: Website Development
web-development.description: Modern and functional websites and applications.
web-development.details: We create fully customized, fast and secure websites and applications for your business. We use responsive design, SEO optimization and the latest technologies. Our goal is to successfully represent your brand in the digital world.

smm.title: SMM
smm.description: Professional management on social media platforms.
smm.details: We effectively manage your brand on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn and other platforms. Achieve success in social media with content planning, advertising and community management.

targeting.title: Targeting
targeting.description: Precise targeting and effective advertising campaigns.
targeting.details: We develop precise targeting strategies to reach your target audience. Get maximum ROI by optimizing your advertising campaigns.

ui-ux.title: UI/UX Design
ui-ux.description: Creative design solutions that enhance user experience.
ui-ux.details: We design interfaces with a user-centered approach. We reflect the spirit of your brand in color palette, typography and visual elements. Our goal is to create a comfortable and attractive experience for users.

digital-marketing.title: Digital Marketing
digital-marketing.description: Introduce and grow your brand in the digital world.
digital-marketing.details: We strengthen your brand in the online environment with digital marketing strategies, social media management, advertising campaigns and analytics. We offer effective solutions to reach your target audience and increase your sales.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Optimization for high ranking in search engines.
seo.details: We perform technical and content optimization for your site to appear in the top ranks of Google and other search engines. We increase your traffic and visibility.

graphic-design.title: Graphic Design
graphic-design.description: Professional graphic design and brand identification.
graphic-design.details: We strengthen your brand with logos, brand books, social media designs and other visual elements. Stand out with creative and modern design solutions.

mobile-development.title: Mobile App Development
mobile-development.description: High-quality mobile applications for iOS and Android.
mobile-development.details: We create fast, functional and aesthetic applications for mobile users. We present perfect solutions that work on iOS and Android platforms. User experience and performance are our priority.

about.title: Creadive Agency - Who Are We?
about.subtitle: Creadive was created to help businesses succeed in the digital world. We offer innovative and effective solutions to our clients.

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.content: Hello! We are the Creadive Agency family. We are the smiling faces behind creative solutions with our team born in the heart of Baku. We know that every brand has its own story and we are eager to deliver these stories in the most beautiful way in the digital world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe that every brand has its own unique voice - our job is to make this voice heard in the digital world! We work hand in hand with our clients, accept their goals as our own goals and work with all our strength on this path.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We have big dreams! We envision a future where Azerbaijani brands have a say at the world level in creativity and innovation. But this is not just a dream - we take steps towards this goal every day.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: Professionalism, innovation, reliability and customer satisfaction are our core values. We accept our clients' goals as our own goals and work with all our strength on this path.

nihad.bio: The founder and CEO of Creadive Agency. He is responsible for the creation and execution of creative solutions. He is also responsible for the technical and business strategy.

enver.bio: Specialized in performance-based marketing. Focus on brand recognition, targeted advertising and achieving results.

fexri.bio: Specialized in copywriting and content creation. Has 5+ years of experience in marketing. Strong portfolio in brand identity and user experience design.

javid.bio: Strong portfolio in bran  d identity and user experience design. Balances functionality and aesthetics in visual design.

alish.bio: Has 4+ years of experience in human resources. Specialized in customer satisfaction and work performance.

azad.bio: Has 4+ years of experience in Python/Django development. Database management, API integrations and server-side solutions.

budget.question: What is the minimum budget to work with Creadive?
budget.answer: Each project is individual and the budget depends on the complexity of the project. We have packages starting from 500 AZN for small brands. Contact us for more accurate information and let's discuss your project.

timeline.question: How long does a website project take?
timeline.answer: Simple landing page takes 1-2 weeks, full website takes 3-4 weeks, e-commerce site takes 4-6 weeks. The complexity of the project and customer requirements affect the time. We provide an exact schedule for each project.

smm.question: What is included in your social media management service?
smm.answer: Our SMM packages include post design, reels/motion video creation, story design, targeting campaigns, account management and reports. Each package offers different services.

support.question: Do you provide support after the project is completed?
support.answer: Yes! All our projects include 1 month of free support. After that, we also offer ongoing technical support and update services. We work with our clients for long-term cooperation.

seo.question: How long does SEO optimization take to show results?
seo.answer: SEO is a long-term strategy. Initial results can be seen within 2-3 months, full effect is achieved within 6-12 months. With the right strategy and continuous work, results are guaranteed.

changes.question: Can I make changes during the project process?
changes.answer: Of course! We provide 2 free change rights during the project process. Additional changes require a small additional payment. Customer satisfaction is our priority.

payment.question: What payment terms do you apply?
payment.answer: Our standard terms: 50% advance, 50% after project completion. For large projects, we can also offer a 3-4 part payment system. All payments are confirmed by contract.

update.question: Can you update my existing website?
update.answer: Yes! Updating existing websites, redesign and functional additions are included in our services. We can also make the transition from old technologies to modern solutions.
